name: Blood and Sand
instructions: Combine all ingredients in shaker tin.
Add ice to small shaker tin.
Shake vigorously, until tin is frosted over.
Strain into chilled rocks glass with fresh ice.
Garnish with a burnt orange twist and enjoy.

name: Americano
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a rocks glass
Garnish with orange wedge and enjoy

name: It's about thyme
instructions: Light thyme on fire and catch smoke in a snifter and cover with a coaster.
Shake grapefruit juice, lime juice, and agave, and then strain into smoked glass.

name: Cloudy Tokyo
instructions: Stir chilled tea and milk in a tall Highball glass.

name: Tommy’s Margarita
instructions: Combine tequila, lime juice, and agave in a cocktail shaker.
Shake with ice until the shaker is slightly frosted over.
Strain over fresh ice in a salt-rimmed rocks glass.

name: Espresso Martini
ingredients: 1 ounce vodka, preferably Belvedere Smógory Forest
3/4 ounce coffee liqueur, preferably Mr. Black Cold Brew Coffee Liqueur
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing tin and shake vigorously with ice.
